scripts.build-site-jquery: shx rm -rf js/min/site-jquery-min.js && shx rm -rf js/min/site-jquery-min.js.map && parcel build assets/js/site-jquery.js --dist-dir js/min --no-cache
scripts.build-site-js: shx rm -rf js/min/site-min.js && shx rm -rf js/min/site-min.js.map && parcel build assets/js/site.js --dist-dir js/min --no-cache
scripts.build-site-css: shx rm -rf css/min/style-min.css && shx rm -rf css/min/style-min.css.map && parcel build assets/scss/style.scss --dist-dir css/min --no-cache
scripts.build-site: pnpm build-site-js && pnpm build-site-jquery && pnpm build-site-css --no-cache
scripts.build-customizer: shx rm -rf js/min/customizer-min.js && shx rm -rf js/min/customizer-min.js.map && parcel build inc/customizer/js/customizer.ts --dist-dir js/min --no-cache
scripts.build-postmessage: shx rm -rf js/min/postmessage-min.js && shx rm -rf js/min/postmessage-min.js.map && parcel build inc/customizer/js/postmessage.ts --dist-dir js/min --no-cache
scripts.build-customize-sections: shx rm -rf Customizer/Sections/dist && parcel build Customizer/Sections/src/sections.ts --dist-dir Customizer/Sections/dist --no-cache
scripts.build-base-control: shx rm -rf Customizer/Controls/Base/dist && parcel build Customizer/Controls/Base/src/base-control.ts --dist-dir Customizer/Controls/Base/dist --no-cache
scripts.build-color-control: shx rm -rf Customizer/Controls/Color/dist && parcel build Customizer/Controls/Color/src/color-control.ts Customizer/Controls/Color/src/color-preview.ts --dist-dir Customizer/Controls/Color/dist --no-cache
scripts.build-margin-padding-control: shx rm -rf Customizer/Controls/MarginPadding/dist && parcel build Customizer/Controls/MarginPadding/src/margin-padding-control.ts Customizer/Controls/MarginPadding/src/margin-padding-preview.ts --dist-dir Customizer/Controls/MarginPadding/dist --no-cache
scripts.build-select-control: shx rm -rf Customizer/Controls/Select/dist && parcel build Customizer/Controls/Select/src/select-control.ts --dist-dir Customizer/Controls/Select/dist --no-cache
scripts.build-slider-control: shx rm -rf Customizer/Controls/Slider/dist && parcel build Customizer/Controls/Slider/src/slider-control.ts Customizer/Controls/Slider/src/input-slider-control.ts Customizer/Controls/Slider/src/responsive-input-slider-control.ts --dist-dir Customizer/Controls/Slider/dist --no-cache
scripts.build-builder-control: shx rm -rf Customizer/Controls/Builder/dist && parcel build Customizer/Controls/Builder/src/builder-control.ts Customizer/Controls/Builder/src/responsive-builder-control.ts --dist-dir Customizer/Controls/Builder/dist
